document.full_text: the judge who ordered the nfl to end the player lockout wants at least another day before deciding whether to put her order on hold after the league appealed her ruling.
document.title: judge awaits players' response before ruling on stay
lines_and_colors: the judge who ordered the nfl to end the player lockout wants at least another day before deciding whether to put her order on hold after the league appealed her ruling.
